title: (Fri Early Bird) Fun Fact Friday + Easy Trivia + Mailbag: Girlfriend Is Still Close To Ex-Boyfriend
itunes:title: (Fri Early Bird) Fun Fact Friday + Easy Trivia + Mailbag: Girlfriend Is Still Close To Ex-Boyfriend
description:
We go around the room and everyone shares a fun fact for Friday! Plus, we test our knowledge with the easiest trivia game ever and someone gets closer to winning the championship. Bobby opens the mailbag and helps a man who found out his girlfriend is still close to her ex-boyfriend. They still hangout and he's not comfortable with it but has no reason not to trust her.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
